svg:
<circle
     id="indicator"
     cx="100"
     cy="100"
     r="50"
     class="
     
     {{ firstBinaryVar == 1 ? 'yellow' : '' }} 
     {{ secondBinaryVar == 1 ? 'red' : '' }} 
     {{ (firstBinaryVar != 1 && secondBinaryVar != 1) ? 'green' : '' }}
     " />
  
  
  {{ firstBinaryVar }}
  {{ secondBinaryVar }}
